description: Try our easy to follow Coconut Pancakes with Pineapple recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Coconut Pancakes with Pineapple Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, layer pancakes onto plates and top with pineapple. Drizzle with syrup and sprinkle with mint. Serve with cream.
